ygData.subject: Re: Some assembled skills/traits connect
ygData.msgSnippet: Str- Rumors are that Blacksmithing also is related to this stat. And heck man.. you re not terribly stupid if you can remember all THAT about EQ. Grin.
ygData.messageBody:
Str- Rumors are that Blacksmithing also is
related to this stat.<br><br>And heck man.. you're not
terribly stupid if you can remember all THAT about EQ.
Grin. J/k. I know what you meant. <br><br>shooman
out<br><br>PS... Int probably isn't the highest priority for a
Rogue. =) 10 points is probably excessive. Not if you're
doing for RP values though. Heh.<br><br>Fatedhue
Prismatic,<br>Master Beggar, Fisher, Alcoholic<br>Eager learner of
languages on the<br>Drinal Server.
